page.title: 13Ghost stories
page.content: None can see the ghostly coach of the Turbervilles but those who have Turberville blood in their veins. From Gallows Hill to Bere Regis, on the eve of Old Lady Day, the sound of a coach is heard and is of ill-omen to the Turberville who hears it. A murder was committed centuries ago by one of the family who is said to have abducted a beautiful woman. She tried to escape from the coach and in the struggle he killed her. Girls living at Philliols Farm often heard footsteps at night like someone walking in wellington boots steadily round the house. The deaf old collie once leapt up barking and growling as the steps went past. Recently the steps have been heard in upstairs rooms. In a cottage at Chamberlaynes sleepers had to change rooms after regular nightmares. A murder had been committed there.
